name: The Alien Virus Space Game
description:
As an astronaut, help deliver vaccines to different planets while overcoming obstacles!

A game by Erna Balayan (Art and Sound Design), Liam Cribbs ( Programmer and Physics Designer), Finn Mefford (Programmer and Narrative Designer), and Rocco Wu (Programmer, Level Designer, and Project Manager)

Player Controls:

WASD: Steer Ship

Spacebar: Stabilize Ship movement

Mouse: aim weapon systems

Left Mouse Button Click: Fire weapon
